tailor.msdmotif
Class DescriptionToXmlQueryTranslator

java.lang.Object
  tailor.msdmotif.DescriptionToXmlQueryTranslator

public class DescriptionToXmlQueryTranslator
extends java.lang.Object

A very crude and limited way to transform tailor.core.Description hierarchies into xml files suitable to send to msdmotif as a query. Hopefully the query language for msdmotif will be radically improved soon...

Author:
maclean
